wk8projdwyerm

Class Merchandise

  • java.lang.Object
    • wk8projdwyerm.Merchandise

  • public class Merchandise
extends java.lang.Object
    The Merchandise class provides the framework for merchandise items, working with the item attributes of id, category, description, price, and whether the item is available Class Merchandise

      • Merchandise

                   java.lang.String category,
                   java.lang.String description,
                   double price,
                   boolean inStock)
        Primary constructor for Merchandise items, specifying attributes of the object
        Parameters:
        id - : the merchandise id
        category - : the category (T-Shirt, Sweatshirt,Stuffed Animal, UNKNOWN)
        description - : the description of the item
        price - : the price the item sells for
        inStock - : whether or not the item is available for sale
